plafar.logic.abstractions.plugin

Interface PlugableLogic

  • All Superinterfaces:
    interfaces.Plugable

    public interface PlugableLogic
extends interfaces.Plugable
    This is a extension interface of Plugable, used to present more information needed for the Logic plugins.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      java.lang.Class<? extends BillingService> getBillingServiceClass()
      This method is used to retrieve the class responsible of Bills handling
      java.lang.Class<? extends ShopingServices> getShopingServiceClass()
      This method is used to retrieve the class responsible of StoreItem handling
